channel.title: Favorite Metal/screamo anything band
channel.description:
Well me and Jon(runewings317) can discuss this forever... We literally talk about this every, like who's better blah blah.
Well who do you think is better?
-Bring me the horizon -Falling in reverse -asking alexandria -all time low -bless the fall -parkway drive -black viel brides -escape the fate -suicide silence
Which one do you think is the best band?

item.title: Favorite Metal/screamo anything band
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:32, topic:443725”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=546402.msg4007591#msg4007591 date=1338827148]

Whoever voted on any of the bands in the poll can just give up right now*

None of them are metal, so stop fucking associating it with metal.

please tell me why Deathmetal has metal in it then?
[/quote]Perhaps because death metal is a derivative of the same elements that make heavy metal, such as blues-influenced guitar solos, melodic rhythms and more importantly: NO pop-punk singers.

See: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KOXLc3rmK10

so you’re calling anything with metal in it, not metal.

Well I’m glad steel is plastic now.[/quote]
What he’s saying is that *core/screamo is NOT metal.

Read full topic

  2. Suicide Silence
  3. Heaven Shall Burn (add them, they’re german… racist)
  4. KSE
  5. Just remove bmth… smh

item.title: Favorite Metal/screamo anything band
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:17, topic:443725”][quote author=t4 link=topic=546402.msg4005670#msg4005670 date=1338603064]
nothing posted so far in this thread has been metal.
[/quote]

I guess the title should specify what type of metal since all you do is criticize everyone’s music style choice.[/quote]
i could care less what OP, and i suppose you, listen to - just don’t call something something it isn’t. everything here so far has been derived from punk more than metal, and i’m sure you’ll agree punk and metal are vastly different.
